title: Index Funds Benefit Endowment, New Orleans Recovery Lead by Technology
itunes:title: Index Funds Benefit Endowment, New Orleans Recovery Lead by Technology
description:
Bloomberg’s Pimm Fox and Bob Ivry sit in for Carol and are joined by Bill Abt, Chief Investment Officer at Carthage College and Bloomberg Endowments Reporter Janet Lorin, to talk about endowment investing. We Drive to the Close with Bill Stone, Chief Investment Officer at Stone Investment Partners. And we finish up with Michael Hecht, President & CEO of Greater New Orleans Inc, who discusses the growth of tech in the Big Easy. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
